119b8('dul ba): khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mthong ba 'ga' yod dam/ kye go'u ta ma re shig ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog ne gro ta 'di nyid du ngo mtshar rmad du bya
120a1('dul ba): ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re shig gsan cig/ kye go'u tam n+ya gro ta 'di'i shar phyogs na/ n+ya gro de'i shing chen po zhig mchis te/ de'i ming gi grong 'di
120a2('dul ba): n+ya gro ta zhes bgyi'o// de'i 'og na shing lnga brgya ma reg cing phan tshun ma thug par mchis lag so// bram ze n+ya gro de'i sa bon ji tsam zhig yod/ ci ri shig gnang tsam 'am/
120a3('dul ba): kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// re sde tsam 'am til dru ba'i 'khor lo tsam 'am/ shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam 'am/ ba'i ko ba tsam 'am/ bil ba'i sha tsam 'am/ ka bid tha'i 'bras
120a4('dul ba): bu tsam 'am/ kye go'u ta ma ma lag so// kye go'u ta ma yungs dkar gyi sa gzhi cha tsam mchis lagaso// bram ze sa bon ni de tsam gyis 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skyes so//
120a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ shes ldan go'u ta ma yid ches kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung / bdag gis mngon sum du gyur lags so// kye go'u ta ma re shig
120a6('dul ba): snag che ba ser sme ba/ dogs cha sgo ma mchis pa'i phyogs su sa bon sar pa drung mdo ma mnyams par mchis pa la dus dus su char bab na/ des na shing n+ya gro chen por 'dir
120a7('dul ba): 'khrungs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa// bram ze'i khyod kyis ji lta bur// zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar/ de
120a8('dul ba): bzhin las kyis rnams smin yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo// ji ltar bram ze khyod kyis blon ni// chu dang shin du shing chen de mthong ba// bram ze ngas kyang sa bon/
120b1('dul ba): chung ngu dag/ phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags brkyang bas dbu skra la thug pa'i bar gyis zhal gyis dkyil 'khor
120b2('dul ba): thams cad g.yog nas/ bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze ji snyam sems/ gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yogs par
120b3('dul ba): byed pa de/ jig 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid stong gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun gyi tshig gsung ngam/ kyi go'u ta ma ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
120b4('dul ba): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga'i ljags ni rgyu med bden pas brkyangs pa dag/ cig bden pa ni gsungs par 'gyur srid dam/ bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de
120b5('dul ba): bzhin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes rtogs par bya ba'i rigs/ de nas bram ze de mngon par dad nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag
120b6('dul ba): la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas brtsegs pa'i 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rngo
120b7('dul ba): rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags/ mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
120b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das deng chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog
121a1('dul ba): dang sngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas bram ze de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
121a2('dul ba): dga' nas/ yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo // sdom la/ ki bi la
121a3('dul ba): dang sbrul sngag dang // ma thu la dang yul 'khor skyong // glang chen grong dang grong khyer tshe/ srag na dang ni bram ze'i grong / grong khyer nag po ra hi ta// bcom ldan 'das
121a4('dul ba): gsing ma can dang de bzhin du/ dga' ba 'phel bas tshogs su ni byas te yang dag brjod pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pi ltar byon nas/ kim bi la'i nags khrod
121a5('dul ba): na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ki bi li la bka' stsal pa/ ki bi la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi las brtsam te/ sgom pa khyod la bshad
121a6('dul ba): kyis de legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do zhes de skad bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa ki bi la cang mi smra'o// lan gnyis su yang de bzhin du
121a7('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan pa ki bi la la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa pi la khyod ston pa gsung ngo // tshe dang ldan
121a8('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lag so// bde
121b1('dul ba): bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi las brtsam te/ bsgom pa bshad na de'i
121b2('dul ba): slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lagaso// kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad// 'di la dge slong
121b3('dul ba): gang yang grong dang grong rdal zhes bya ba dang / dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs na dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs so zhes bya ba nas/ lus kyi 'du byed shin du sbyangs te/ lus
121b4('dul ba): la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dbugs rjes su zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe
121b5('dul ba): 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// kun dga' bo dper na lam po che'i myador dngul gyis mchod rten brtsigs par
121b6('dul ba): gyur la/ de nas shar phyogs nas gzhon pa can nam khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ dngul gyis mchod
121b7('dul ba): rten 'jigs par 'gyur ro// brdzun pa 'gyur lag so// de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs so zhes slob pa nas bya ba nas/
121b8('dul ba): nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang gis tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong ba zhes bya ba nas sems kyis 'du byed
122a1('dul ba): ha shin du sbyangs te/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing dbug phyung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos
122a2('dul ba): gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i gzhi mdo'i dngul gyi mchod rten brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas lho phyogs
122a3('dul ba): nas gzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa zhig yongs na zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
122a4('dul ba): du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed par shes so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang / sems rab du dag
122a5('dul ba): ba dang / sems mnyam par bzhog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs rngub na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs rngub so zhes slob bo// sem
122a6('dul ba): rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyis rjes su lta'o// gang gi tshe 'phags
122a7('dul ba): pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas shes par bya'o// de lus de dang tshor ba de dang sems de la brnab sems
122a8('dul ba): dang / yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas chos rnams la chos kyis rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la
122b1('dul ba): byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na lam po che'i gzhi mdor dngul gyi mchod rten brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas gzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas
122b2('dul ba): khyams pa zhig 'ong na/ kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ dngul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so// zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos
122b3('dul ba): la chos rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo de ltar na dran
122b4('dul ba): pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te/ sgom pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri bor zhig tu byon to// ri bor de na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po la
122b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhang po la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar
122b6('dul ba): mnyan to// de gdul ba'i dus shes nas drang srong rnams kyis sti gnas su 'jug par brtsam so// de nas drang srong des smras pa/ dge sbyong 'dug shig bram ze rnams kyi
122b7('dul ba): sti gnas su 'dir ma 'jug shig/ des smras pa yang bram ze yin no// drang srong des tshig su bcad de smras pa// bram ze khyed la gsad byed med de// blugs bzar yang yod
122b8('dul ba): rnam yin/ khyod ni mgo reg me mchod min// bram ze bdag ces ci ste smra// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bram ze nga'i ngo tsha shes
123a1('dul ba): gsang byed blugs bzar shes rab nyid// chu rgyun rten 'bab dang ba ni// nga'i ril pa spyi lugs yin// nang du legs par mnyam bzhag pa'i/
123a2('dul ba): bden pa kho bo mi mchod de// yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis// nyin mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed// gal te de ltar gyur na yang // dge sbyong mgo reg la ni 'dir skabs mi 'byed//
123a3('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rlung dang char drag btang nas mtsho bran dang / nye ba zhig tu song nas shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go/ de nas klu'i rgyal po
123a4('dul ba): dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i 'khor zhig gnas pa des bsam pa/ 'di ni 'phags pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yin te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis
123a5('dul ba): kyis bla mar bya ba yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di'i mchod par bya ba la brtson par bya'o snyam te/ klu de gnas nas byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po'i
123a6('dul ba): lus la lan bdun du dkris te/ stengs nas mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyi gnas par bya'o/ gling gzhan ma yin
123a7('dul ba): zhing skyabs gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab par bya'o// mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/
123a8('dul ba): gang zhig yod na ci la mngon par zhan te/ bdag ni ci yin zhes su lha rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ga
123b1('dul ba): dag ma skyes pa ni skyes shing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa lags/ btso
123b2('dul ba): ldan 'das ni ston pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyi don 'di nyid dge slong rnams la bshad pa na/ bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par
123b3('dul ba): 'gyur lags so// dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag gzugs yod na gzugs la brten nas/ gzugs
123b4('dul ba): la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
123b5('dul ba): pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skyes shing skyes pa rnams ni 'phel zhing skyes par 'gyur/ dge slong dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
123b6('dul ba): yod na/ rnam par shes pa la brten nas/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen te/ rnam par shes pa ni bdag yin no// zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang smre sngags
123b7('dul ba): 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid byed ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skyes shing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// dge slong nga/
123b8('dul ba): khyod kyis ltos shig ces bya ba nas/ dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs na rngubs so zhes slob ste/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// des
124a1('dul ba): che 'phags pa'i nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa nang gi yid byed pa yod par
124a2('dul ba): shes te/ dper na/ kun dga' bo lam po che'i gzhi mdor dngul gyi mchod rten zhig rtsig par gyur la/ lho phyogs nas gzhon pa can nam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa zhig
124a3('dul ba): 'od na zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par she
124a4('dul ba): so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang / sems rab du dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol ba byed cing dbugs
124a5('dul ba): rngubs so zhes slob pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo // zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyis rjes su lta ba de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems
124a6('dul ba): kyis rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// dper na ni nub phyogs nas 'khyogs 'ongs pa de nyid
124a7('dul ba): du bya'o// de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba dag nub pas chos kyi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so// de'i tshe
124a8('dul ba): 'phags pa'i nyan thos chos kyis rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa nang / nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te 'di lta ste/ lam po che'i
124b1('dul ba): gzhi mdor dngul gyis mchod rten zhig rtsigs par 'gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas ni gzhon gzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa 'ong na kun dga'
124b2('dul ba): bo ji snyam du sems/ dngul gyi mchod rten 'jigs par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so// zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta'o zhes bya
124b3('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
124b4('dul ba): la brten nas bsgoms yin no// bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal
124b5('dul ba): na bzhugs so// bang mdzod stug po can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bang mdzod stug po can
124b6('dul ba): du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can bang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes dgos so// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshegs dang / khyu nas khyur 'dus shing phrad na
124b7('dul ba): bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
124b8('dul ba): 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod skyugs po can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
125a1('dul ba): dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab du dga' bar mdzad do// // 'dul ba bzhi//
125a2('dul ba): bam po sum bcu gsum pa/ de'i tshe khyim bdag gis bu yul 'khor de nyid 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'di snyam du sems
125a3('dul ba): te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis shes pa lta na/ khyim bdag khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa cig po las bgyis
125a4('dul ba): dag pa ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang bar spyad pa 'di ni bslab pa yin pas/ ma la bdag gis sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig
125a5('dul ba): bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ngo snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze
125a6('dul ba): dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng stod// yang dag par rab du dga' bar
125a7('dul ba): mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas bang mdzod stug po can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yid
125a8('dul ba): rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar nas dong ngo // khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bang mdzad
125b1('dul ba): stug po can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring por ma lon par rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
125b2('dul ba): na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
125b3('dul ba): du byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa/ dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o// khyim bdag
125b4('dul ba): gi bu pa dang ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/ btsun pa ma gnang ngo // khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha dang / ma gnyis
125b5('dul ba): kyis ma gnang bar 'byin pa dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par mi byed do// btsun pa bdag gis ci nas mas gnang ba de ltar bgyis lags so// de nas khyim bdag gi bu
125b6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyongs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yid rangs nas rang gi khyim gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin pa dang / pha dang ma la
125b7('dul ba): 'di skad ces smra so// yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim mchis par rab du 'byung bar bgyi'o// bu yul 'khor skyong
125b8('dul ba): shes par gyis shig/ khyed nged kyis bu cig pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa mi mthun pa med pa yin pas/ khyod shi bar gyur na nged mi 'dod bzhin 'bral grang //
126a1('dul ba): gson bzhin du ga la gtad/ yab yum gal te/ re shig gnang na legs gal te ma 'dug go/ drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug
126a2('dul ba): bsngal ba la ma bsam na/ drang srong chos las nyams par 'gyur bas/ de nas drang srong de 'di snyam sems/ te/ rab du byung ba de rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur
126a3('dul ba): te/ bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de nas sti gnas de nas phyir byung ste/ dga' bar bsams pa na/ des de mthong nas smras pa/ kye
126a4('dul ba): rab du byung ba kho bo cag gi bsti gnas su zhugs shig/ des smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/ drang srong des de'i nga ro las
126a5('dul ba): ngo shes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po lags sam/ drang srong bdag skye bos de ltar shes so// 'phags pa don ci zhig la byon// khyod nyid kyis
126a6('dul ba): gdul ba'i 'du shes nas 'ongs so// chur spyon bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhud do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
126a7('dul ba): byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zhang po khrid de
126a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi zhang po drang srong gi nang du rab du byung ba 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la chos bshang
126b1('dul ba): pa'i rigaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/
126b2('dul ba): de thos pas drang srong des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/ de nas stan las ladwa te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
126b3('dul ba): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag leg
126b4('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab du 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa
126b5('dul ba): spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog zhes bya bas rab du byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog ces bka' stsal pa/ skra byi
126b6('dul ba): rnam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod la dbang po rab du zhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' bar gyur// ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
126b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po song ba dang / klu gzhon nu de dag de na gcig pu mi dga' bar gyur nas/ de nas ri bo der yams nad dag btang ste/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha
126b8('dul ba): byang du mngon par sprul nas/ sti gnas der song ste gnas der song ste gnas so// de nas ri bo de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de sti gnas der lhags nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen
127a1('dul ba): bo bdag cag la yams kyis nang byung na bdag cag gi ji ltar bgyi 'am/ drang srong gis smras pa/ phyogs 'di nyid du sheg la 'dug shig dang / zhi bar 'gyuraro//
127a2('dul ba): de nas ri bo na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de phyogs der lhags nas gnas so// phyogs der sbrul gyis bdug pas sbrul bdugs sbrul gdugs zhes bya bar grags te/ dad pa can rnam
127a3('dul ba): kyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsig so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma thul na 'bab chu rab du bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gram slob pa rnams kyis a mra'i
127a4('dul ba): tshul na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyab
127a5('dul ba): la gnas par bya ba'i gling gzhan ma yin/ skyabs gzhan ma yin no// dge slong dag khyod kyis bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid gnang na deng sran chad 'tshal yang mi 'tshal phyag kyang mi
127a6('dul ba): 'tshal lo// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis nyi ma cig kyang zan cang bar byas so// gnyis dang gsum nas bdun gyis bar du zan bcad par byas so// de nas khyim
127a7('dul ba): bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis pa dang mas khyim bdag gis bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/ khyod ni shin du ga
127a8('dul ba): ba bde ba 'dod pa yin pas/ khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi shes te// tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o// rab du dben pa bya dka'o// gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' ba dka'
127b1('dul ba): gnas lam dgon pa dang nags khrod dang / bas mthar gnas pa ni gnas dka'o// bu yul 'khor skyong tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dag la spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag byin cig/ bsod
127b2('dul ba): nams dag kyang gis shig/ de skad ces smras na/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas khyim bdag gis bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas nye du rnams
127b3('dul ba): la brtsol ba/ kye nye du dag ri shig/ bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul
127b4('dul ba): 'khor stong la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig khyed ni shin du gzhon pas bde bar bzhed pa lags zhes bya ba nas bsod nams dag
127b5('dul ba): gis shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas
127b6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ljang rnams la brtsol ba/ kye gzhon nu dag re shig bu yul 'khor skyong srong shig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldang rnams kyis/
127b7('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sras de pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig khyod ni shin du gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags zhes bya ba nas/ bsod
127b8('dul ba): nams dag mdzod cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o de skad ces smras nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas gzhon nu dag gis yul 'khor skyong
128a1('dul ba): gi pha dang ma la 'di skad smras so// yab dang yum sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig bgyi/ rab du 'byung du gnod dang / gal te dga'
128a2('dul ba): bar gyur na 'di gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/ gal te mngon par mi dga' bar gyur na/ yung bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags par gzhan su zhig mchis/ gzhon
128a3('dul ba): nu bdag cag gal te rab du byung nas lta bar byed na/ de bzhin du gnang bar bya'o// de nas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u rdzings kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad
128a4('dul ba): ces smras so// des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod/ 'di skad ces gal te rab du byung nas lta bar byed do// zhes kyang zer ro// shes ldan dag blta bar bya'o// de nas
128a5('dul ba): khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rims kyis lus kyis mthu dang stobs bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
128a6('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gis bu yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces
128a7('dul ba): gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis pha dang mas gnang lags kyis/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab du byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par
128a8('dul ba): dge slong dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi legs par gsungs pa
128b1('dul ba): chos 'dul ba la rab du byung dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rab
128b2('dul ba): du byung ba bsnyen pa rdzogs par mdzad nas/ bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas ji tsam bzhed kyis bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim
128b3('dul ba): kyi rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan
128b4('dul ba): pa yul 'khor srung bsnyen par rdzogs te/ lo bcu lon nas dgra bcom pa thob ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon
128b5('dul ba): bdag gis khyim par gyur pa na/ pha dang ma la rab du byung ba nas lta bar bya'o zhes khas blangs pa de mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom
128b6('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
128b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mngon bdag gis khyim par gyur pa na/ pha dang ma la blta bar bya'o zhes g.yar
128b8('dul ba): gyis blangs pa de mthar 'byin du mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sems khyab par mdzad cing khyab par mdzad nas/ thugs la mdzad
129a1('dul ba): cing thugs la mdzad nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni slar yang khyim na gnas pa 'am/ sog 'jog spyod pas 'dod
129a2('dul ba): ba dag longs spyod pa ni 'os ma yin no snyam du 'dzin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong la sems can ma sprul ba rnam
129a3('dul ba): ni sgrol cig/ mo grol ba rnams ni grol bar gyis shig/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs phyung shig/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzlos shig/
129a4('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' de yid rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
129a5('dul ba): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyis mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gro
129a6('dul ba): thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba bya ste zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log nas/ gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab ste/ lhung
129a7('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos blangs nas/ bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste rim gyis spyad pa spyod cing rgyu ba na'ang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug na
129a8('dul ba): can gyi bang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyis mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thog
129b1('dul ba): khang mdzod stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de rim gyis bang mdzod stug po can nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na rang gi khyim gang na ba der song nas/ de'i
129b2('dul ba): che tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha bar sgo'i khyams na/ skyes pa skra mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu chos pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pas tshe dang ldan pa
129b3('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong sgo drung 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kha zer bar byed do// dge sbyong mgo reg 'o na dag gi ni khe bo'i rigs kyis rgyun bcad do// 'on dag gis kho'i
129b4('dul ba): bu gcig pu sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mi 'thun pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab du byung ba bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas nas/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod
129b5('dul ba): snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi khyim nas brgya gag ma rtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/ bkrad kyang ma bkrad pa dang / myur ba myur
129b6('dul ba): bar phyir byung ngo // de'i tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyis bran mo rgan mo zhig zan dron dul ba zhag lon pa zhig dor ba'i phyir thogs te/ sgor byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul
129b7('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi bram ze rgan mo de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bram ze rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smraso// sring mo gal te zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa 'dor ba yin na kho bos
129b8('dul ba): bza'i lhung bzed 'dir chug shig/ 'phags pa gsol cig/ de nas sngon gyi bram ze rgan mo des zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa lhung bzed du 'jug pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
130a1('dul ba): skyong gi lag pa dang rkang pa bzhin dang / sna dang / smre sngags kyis mtshan ma shin du legs par bzungs nas 'di skad ces smras so// rje'i sras yul
130a2('dul ba): 'khor skyongs lags sam/ sring mo kho bo skye bo dag gi de ltar shes so// de nas sngon gyis bran mo rgan mo zhig de rings par ring bar tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyongs gi pha gang na ba
130a3('dul ba): der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ sus yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas
130a4('dul ba): ring mo zhig lags na/ nyid kyis khab du byon mi bzhed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis phas lag pa g.yon pas skra bsdus na/ ras yug gi smad g.yogs
130a5('dul ba): dgos bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong rtsig drung du 'dug nas zan dron rul pa zhag lon par za ba
130a6('dul ba): byed pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// yul 'khor skyong khyod bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring
130a7('dul ba): mo zhig lon na ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/ zan rul ba zhag lon pa khyod gre bar yang ji ltar 'gro bar btub/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na rgya gag ma rtog
130a8('dul ba): pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/ skad kyang ma skud pa dang / myur ba myur bar byung ngo // bu yul 'khor skyongs la yin par kho bos ma shes mod kyi gal te khos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig/
130b1('dul ba): bu yul 'khor skyong bzod pa gsol lo// khyim bdag bzod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong yan lag thams cad kyis
130b2('dul ba): mkhyud pa byed nas/ rang gi khyim du gdan bshams pa gnyis la 'dug tu bcug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces
130b3('dul ba): smras so// bu yul 'khor skyongs yun rings po lon nas khyim du 'ong nas khyim du 'ongs kyis/ kye re shig khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du chos la lta gon gyis dang / de bu yul
130b4('dul ba): 'khor skyong longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma rang nyid kyi snod du brtsos nas sta gon byas so// de nas mi zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa yul
130b5('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyis phung po gal te mi zhig pha rol na 'gred mi cig tshu rol na 'dug pa mi mthong na/ mi cig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba
130b6('dul ba): sngangs so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la bud med kyi nor dang / bud
130b7('dul ba): med kyi bag rdzang dang / bud med kyi khung pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di snyed cig yod do// gzhan yang khyod kyis pa'i ni mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang / sa le sbrum
130b8('dul ba): yang brgya phrag du ma dang / brgya stong du ma yod pa la phal gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bu yul 'khor skyong tshur shog/ khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yong yongasu spyod cig
131a1('dul ba): sbyin pa dag kyang thong shig/ bsod nams dag kyang gis shig khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems
131a2('dul ba): dpa' lta na bdag gis gdams shing rjes su bstan to// bu yul 'khor skyong gdam ngag stsal cig/ bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cig dang khyod kyis tshig la bdag dad pa
131a3('dul ba): mnyan par bgyi'o// mnyam du sems so// khyim bdag gi chung mtshur/ khyod kyis sha na'i ras skye sar rab byos la gser dang sa le sbram gyis khong ste/ shing rta'i nang du chug la
131a4('dul ba): chu bo gang ga'i rgyun zhugs drag cing zab pa gang na yod pa dor 'or cig/ gzhi de las khyod mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
131a5('dul ba): pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul skyong gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi de lta bu byas kyang bu yul 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ma nus na snyam mo//
131a6('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sa mas/ mna' ma lha bcol ba/ kye bag gsar re shig ji lta bu'i nye ba rnams kyis nyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis dkrus pa dang /
131a7('dul ba): rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams kyis skon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / gdugs pa rnams kyis gdugs pa dang phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas bu yul
131a8('dul ba): 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba pa rnams kyis mnye ba dang / khrus rnams kyis bkru ba dang / dri rnams kyis
131b1('dul ba): byug pa dang / gos rnams kyis bkon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdugs pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang phye ma rnams kyis gtor bar gyis la/ bu yul 'khor
131b2('dul ba): skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la btugs la 'di skad ces gang gis slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa/ lha'i bu mo ji lta ba bzhin/ ces
131b3('dul ba): kyang smros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyis chung mas ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams
131b4('dul ba): kyis byugs pa dang gos rnams kyis bkon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis gdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ tshe dang ldan
131b5('dul ba): pa yul 'khor skyong sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnye ba dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnam
131b6('dul ba): kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams kyis bkon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bar byas nas/ tshe
131b7('dul ba): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la btugs te 'di skad ces smras so// rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa
131b8('dul ba): lha mo de de ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul
132a1('dul ba): 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi nu ma la sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pa/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pa dang ma
132a2('dul ba): la smras pa/ yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na ci mi stsal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag te ci mtho tsam lags sam bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod cig/ de
132a3('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gis lag nas stobs shing
132a4('dul ba): tshim par byed do// rnam grangs du mar gtsang shing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
132a5('dul ba): gis zos nas/ lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
132a6('dul ba): skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// ltos zhig lus ni nor bu dang // rna brgyan gyis ska byas pa yang // nang dang slu ba'i chos can te// gtam par gnas pa yod
132a7('dul ba): ma yin// skra'i lan bu brgyad blangs shing // mig ni mig sman bkrus pa yang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyis// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// dri rnams kyi ni lus
132a8('dul ba): skas la// rkang pa rtsag gis byugs pa yang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyis// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// mig sman gser gyis skra phyes shing // rul ba'i lus
132b1('dul ba): ni brgyan pa yang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyis// pha rol tshogs pa ma yin no// ri dgas shor ba sti gtsug nas// ri dgas bzung ba ma nus ltar// rngon pa'o//
132b2('dul ba): dod 'bod bcug la// zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang ma la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi yang dag par bstan/
132b3('dul ba): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab du dga' bar byos nas/ de nyid steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa
132b4('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gi snyan pa rdzogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig nas gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i
132b5('dul ba): phyir skabasta na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ ka'i nang rje khyod song la myur du bang mdze/
132b6('dul ba): stug po can gyi tshal phyag dar byos shig/ sang nga der skyed mos tshal gyis der 'gro'o// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa de sa rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas
132b7('dul ba): bang mdzod stug po can tshul thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing drung na nyin par gnas par bu pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong
132b8('dul ba): ngo nyi/ mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
133a1('dul ba): mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ rgyal po ko'u bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur
133a2('dul ba): snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis ma la bdag gi rgyal po ko'u rab bya ba la sbran par bya'o snyam
133a3('dul ba): nas/ des skyes pa de rgyal po ko'u rab bya ga na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha gang gi snyan pa rdzogs pa yang dang yang sgrogs
133a4('dul ba): shig bzhugs pa la nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs
133a5('dul ba): 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni lags te/ bang mdzod stegs po can gyis 'di lta bu zhig du mchis lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab
133a6('dul ba): par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas mi gzhan zhig la sgo ba ka'i nang rje tshur gzhon pa bzang po myur du sdoms shig/ de la nga zhon nas deng nga la zhon
133a7('dul ba): nas/ deng kho na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du
133a8('dul ba): sngogs te rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha bcibs pa bzang bdogs lags te/ lha da de'i
133b1('dul ba): dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya gzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas bang mdzod stug po can byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la
133b2('dul ba): lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/ des ji tsam gzhon pa'i sar song ste/ gzhon pa las babs nas/ rkang pa khong kun dga' bar bzhugs so// tshe
133b3('dul ba): dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so/
133b4('dul ba): tshur byon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags pas/ bzhed na bdag kyang stan la g.yar drongs shig/ yul 'khor skyong bdag gis yul lags mod kyi 'on kyang
133b5('dul ba): bdag yul 'khor skyong gis bdag la g.yar drang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po gdan mchis kyis gal te bzhed na bzhugs shig/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya
133b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs cig tu 'du
133b7('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad smras so// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gal te rigs dma' ba 'am/
133b8('dul ba): spyod rnams yongs su zad pa 'am/ gtugs par gyur na skra dang kha spu breg te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yod na/
134a1('dul ba): bdag cag rigs ni ko'u rab bya yin la/ longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis 'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi/ bsku
134a2('dul ba): ba dag las bgo ba sha' byas shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag thongs shig/ bsod nams dag gis
134a3('dul ba): shig/ rgyal po chen po che ma lags pa'i 'gron du 'bod pas bdag 'gron du 'bod pas mtshams pas ni ma lags so// khyod lta bu bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di
134a4('dul ba): lta bu'i 'gron du'ang ma 'bod cig/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang mtshams pa'i 'gron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po chur spyon khyod kyis
134a5('dul ba): 'di skad ces kye yul 'khor skyong kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa slong ba'i bsod snyoms rnyed bla ba yin gyis/ shes ldan yul 'khor
134a6('dul ba): skyong bar mdzod stug po can 'dir mnos shig dang / bdag gi shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags na/
134a7('dul ba): rgyal po chen po mes mngon dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis lags te 'tshal to// gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir/ skabs phye na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
134a8('dul ba): la bdag zhu lags so// rgyal po chen po gsungs shig/ thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o// kye yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te/ de dag
134b1('dul ba): gi yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyis bu dag skra dang kha spu breg te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung bar 'gyur
134b2('dul ba): ro/ bzhi gang zhe 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang / longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams
134b3('dul ba): pa'o// kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyis bu rgas 'khogs gdugs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag
134b4('dul ba): rgas 'khogs gtugs pas bdag gis re shig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyod par sla ba ma yin na/ mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu
134b5('dul ba): bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ de rga ba yongs su nyams pa yongs su nyams pas/
134b6('dul ba): skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du 'byung ste/ 'di ni rga ba'i yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// she
134b7('dul ba): ldan yul 'khor skyong rga ba'i yongasu nyams pas/ yongs su nyams pa ma yin// skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
134b8('dul ba): khyim med par rab du byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nu thur bu lang mtsho la babs pa/ skra gnag pa na chod do la bab pa dang ldan pa yin/
135a1('dul ba): te/ gang che rtsed mo dang dga' ba dang mgu ba dang cha ba dang / rgyan pa'i gnas pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe nye du mchims snang zhing du gzhan dang
135a2('dul ba): bcas pas ma rang bzhin skra dang kha spu breg te gos smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci
135a3('dul ba): zhig shes/ mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ba de la ni kho bo rangs pa
135a4('dul ba): ma yin te mi bzod do// kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong nas kyis yongs su nyams su gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyis bu na ba bsdug bsngal bar nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/
135a5('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bas bdag gis re shig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyod par bla ba ma yin na/ mi bdog na lta smos
135a6('dul ba): kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas shes bya ba nas rab du byung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu
135a7('dul ba): bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o// 'di ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis yongs
135a8('dul ba): su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin no// skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba nas rab du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar go
135b1('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa rting nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang / ran par 'ju ba'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa
135b2('dul ba): dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / chos pa dang / myang ba rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar gyur na/ shes ldan
135b3('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas/ rab du byung ba'i bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bos rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kye yul 'khor
135b4('dul ba): skyong nye dus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyis bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha dag nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis nye du rnams
135b5('dul ba): rabs chad nye du rnams kha dag nas ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab du byung bar bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nye du yongasu nyams
135b6('dul ba): bas yongs su snyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nye dus yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan
135b7('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong ni dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med
135b8('dul ba): bar rab du 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni ko'u bya'i rigs nas bzungs te/ rgyad pa bang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan
136a1('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab du byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin mi bzod do/
136a2('dul ba): kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyis bu'i longs spyod srab pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur nas/
136a3('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis longs spyod ni srab pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang gtugs par gyis/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab du byung
136a4('dul ba): ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la longs spyod yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba'i nas rab du byang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
136a5('dul ba): 'di la ni longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni longs spyod yongs su nyams pa ma yin na zhes bya ba nas rab du byung ngo zhes bya
136a6('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stug po can 'di ni rig mchog rigs bzangs po yin pas 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa
136a7('dul ba): yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho na
136a8('dul ba): khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ngo // de la ni kho bo rangs pa yin te mi bzod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
136b1('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba'i de dag gis byung nas/ rigs kyi bu rnams sku dang
136b2('dul ba): ring ga'
136b3('dul ba): kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni be
136b4('dul ba): nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med par skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bgod pa med pa yin/ 'jig
136b5('dul ba): rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes te/ sred pas 'khol pas mchog mi shes par bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas
136b6('dul ba): dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ngo // bdag gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par me phye bas de'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur
136b7('dul ba): bas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gi don de nyid ci las bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te/ don rgyas par bshad du gsol/ shes ldan
136b8('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rgas pas nye bar khrid pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis
136b9('dul ba): ci las dgongs te gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ ga
137a1('dul ba): gis tshe lo nyi shu 'am/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang mtsho la bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ nyams
137a2('dul ba): rtsal bde ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe 'am kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ smre sngags sam/ srid du 'am sboms su mnyam zhing mtshungs
137a3('dul ba): par mthong ngam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu 'am/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang mtsho bab pa/ skra gnag pa/
137a4('dul ba): nyams rtsal bde ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyis lus 'di lta ste 'tshe 'am/ kha dog gam stobs shugs sam/ srid du 'am/ sboms su 'am/ smre sngags su mnyam zhing
137a5('dul ba): mtshungs par mthong ste/ da ni bdag na chod kyis lo brgya bcu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs te bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang / langs pa yang gzhan gyis bya dgos so
137a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di la dgongs nas 'jig rten
137a7('dul ba): 'di thams cad ni dga' bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gi shes/ mthong pos rtogs nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs na/ gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang
137a8('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gangs la rengs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang bzod do//
137b1('dul ba): gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di rjes su 'gro ba med pas/ skyabs med pas/ skyabs med pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa/ bdag la ni bu
137b2('dul ba): dang chung ma dang / bran dang / las gyid pa dang / gzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta skya dang /
137b3('dul ba): shing rta ba dang / bshan thogs pa dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'drol bu dang / go re lob bgyid pa dang / bro ga len pa rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab
137b4('dul ba): du gnon pa/ mtshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag bdag gis gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba slar 'joms par bgyid pa mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor
137b5('dul ba): skyong ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skye ba med pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gi ci lags dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen
137b6('dul ba): po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po da ltar khyod la lus kyi gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/ kye yul 'kho
137b7('dul ba): skyong dag la mchis te/ da ltar rlung gi rgyab du gnod do// rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe rlung gi rgyab du gnod par gyur pa'i de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang chung ma dang / bran dngal
137b8('dul ba): byed pa dang gzhad gang ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rgya ba dang / shing rta ba dang / bshan thogs dang /
138a1('dul ba): gzhu 'dzin dang / 'grol bu dang / ge re long byed pa dang / srog len pa dang / rgyal ba'i bu dpa' brtul pod dparab du gnon pa chan pa ma chen po dang
138a2('dul ba): ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba mi zad pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis na 'grub
138a3('dul ba): bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lag so// gang gi tshe klung gis bdag gi rgyab du gnod par gyur de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang chung ma dang / bran dang las bgyid pa dang / gzhang
138a4('dul ba): ga ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che gnya' zhon pa dang / rta rgya dang / bshad thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'grol bu dang /
138a5('dul ba): go re long bgyid pa dang / bro ga len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ rab du gnon pa mtshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur bdag la byung zhing
138a6('dul ba): skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams tshems cig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag 'ga' zhig sdug bsngal
138a7('dul ba): drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo // rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
138a8('dul ba): mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jigs na 'di na rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos/ rtogs nas
138b1('dul ba): skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ste/ de la ni bdag rengs de bzod do// shes ldan
138b2('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gang la rengs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rengs te bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang la yang shes ldan yul
138b3('dul ba): 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang
138b4('dul ba): chung ma dang / bran dang las bgyid pa dang / zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang dag mchis na rjes bzhin 'brang la/
138b5('dul ba): 'greng na 'gro ba dang / nyal na zhugs tshe bgyis pa dag mchis na 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur ba
138b6('dul ba): bdog pa med pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs rgyal po chen po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ khyod
138b7('dul ba): ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga'
138b8('dul ba): bta skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis thun mongs 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gis bu dang chung
139a1('dul ba): ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag chur shes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas/ 'jig rten pa
139a2('dul ba): rol du 'gro ba'i phyir bzhin gshegs pa shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so// kye yul 'khor skyong gang gis che skye bo mang po la mi sdug
139a3('dul ba): pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mya po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis thun mongs 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i
139a4('dul ba): che/ bdag gis bu dang chung ma dang / bran dang las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// bdag gi
139a5('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du 'chi ba'i phyi bzhin gshegs shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'chi bar 'gyur//
139a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas/
139a7('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di'i na thams cad bor te 'gyur bas/ bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de dag cag gis shes mthong pos rtogs nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas
139a8('dul ba): gos dus smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la
139b1('dul ba): rengs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzad do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog
139b2('dul ba): mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag skra ngan rgyas 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su
139b3('dul ba): longs spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing / srid pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no// zhes gsungs
139b4('dul ba): pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ rgyal po
139b5('dul ba): chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di ni sgra ngan rgyas la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las shar phyogs nas mi
139b6('dul ba): yid btsugs pa yid ches pa/ brtan po 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ong nas/ de 'di skad ces lha bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir 'chi ba na/ de bdag gi ljongs 'byor pa
139b7('dul ba): dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab du gang bdag cig mthong ste/ lha ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i dbying
139b8('dul ba): dang / gzhon pa dang / tshoms nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo zhes smra na rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod yul der dra ma drangs shing dra ma drangs na bcom ste/
140a1('dul ba): rnal du dgod dam/ khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis de dag 'di lta bu'i dbyigs dang / 'di
140a2('dul ba): lta bu'i dbu dang / 'di lta bu'i gzhon pas dra ma drangs pa dang / dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang / bcom nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes nas ljongs de dag
140a3('dul ba): tu dra ma drangs shing dra ma drangs nas/ bcom la bcom nas rnal du dgod do// bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo// de rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
140a4('dul ba): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ de las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing srid
140a5('dul ba): pas bkol pas chog mi shes pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes/ mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ ded
140a6('dul ba): pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de dag
140a7('dul ba): la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi de skad ces smras nas/ gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig
140a8('dul ba): rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi de dag chags dang bcas pas stsogs byed cing / nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la/ phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gtong ba mthong / mi dbang rgya
140b1('dul ba): mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa yis// zag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni// rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi kyang mi mchog ste// chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad// mi dbang de
140b2('dul ba): bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag/ yongs su bzung la ngoms pa yod min pas// chog mi shes pas rang gi lus bor te// sred dang ma bral bar ni 'gyur// srog ni ther zug ma yin che
140b3('dul ba): thung ste// rga bas gzigs pa la ni skyabs yod min// mchi ba na ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur// nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin// spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang /
140b4('dul ba): snying du sdug pa'i tshogs 'di 'dus na ni// kye ma kyi hud 'di ni sngar gyur ces// skra bshig mchi ma can gyis gdong gis ngu// de ni ras kyis dkris te phyung nas ni// me sbar nas ni de
140b5('dul ba): nas sreg par byed// rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas// de rnams bgo skal spyad pas 'phrog/ 'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu ste/ mchi ba na yang gcig pu mchi 'gyur
140b6('dul ba): zhing / cig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur// skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no// phyug po 'am yang na bkren pa 'am brten po 'am// bus pa de bzhin gnyis
140b7('dul ba): kas reg gyur na// brtan po de yis nams kyang g.yos ma gyur// bus pa bus pa yin phyir brtag tu g.yo// blo chung mi khas rje su slo byed cing // las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur
140b8('dul ba): zhing ta mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol// shes rab nor rnams kun gyis mchog tu gsungs// bdag nyid
141a1('dul ba): shes pas bdag nyid rig/ srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma rtogs pas// blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin// phran chags thabs sam yang
141a2('dul ba): na chos min pa 'am// mthu yis gzhan dag la ni gang phrog pa// nyes byed las byed 'khor ba la brten nas// nying gtor rgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar rkun po
141a3('dul ba): khyim 'bigs gzungs nas ni// sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyi bcom// de bzhin skye dgu nyes byed 'di dang ni// de dag 'jig rten rang gi las kyis bcom// shing las
141a4('dul ba): shing rtogs bzhin du mi rnams ni// gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang lhung // 'dod pa sna tshogs sdug cing yid 'ong ba// rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms//
141a5('dul ba): 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di mching chags par 'gyur// 'dod pa yod na kho na dang 'jigs pa ste/ de las rgyal po 'di nas rab byang ste/ dge slong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin//
141a6('dul ba): de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yid rangs nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs te
141a7('dul ba): song ngo // bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon pa dang / bram ze zhig gis bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi kun nas brgyan pa/ dge
141a8('dul ba): byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba de/ rgyang ring ring
141b1('dul ba): po kho nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar song nas/ tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can mig du sdug pa dang /
141b2('dul ba): dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan// mi 'dul 'khor lo bsgyur ba lha'i lha/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa
141b3('dul ba): mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad
141b4('dul ba): pa na zhes bya ba nas mdzod spur nub par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas
141b5('dul ba): nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis ska ba'i zhes bya ba nas/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te de de bzhin to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo de bzhin
141b6('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze de bzhin gshes
141b7('dul ba): pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa// gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar mi
141b8('dul ba): 'gyur te/ 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su/ nying mtshams su sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gis ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la rang sangs
142a1('dul ba): rgyas stong 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshoms skyes nas the tshoms thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
142a2('dul ba): btsun pa bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das las tshigs su bcad pa cig gis bstod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub du lung bstan gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
142a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyis ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog lnga byin
142a4('dul ba): pa de la legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byang ba ban se'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /
142a5('dul ba): bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab du gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug go de lhag par snyan dang gsol dga' bar gyur to// ba na se na bram ze snyan sngags
142a6('dul ba): mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de la bram ze mos smras pa/ bram ze glang ba'i dus la bab kyis rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la rjes su 'thun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byas dang /
142a7('dul ba): gal te na grang ma'i skyabs cung zad thob par 'gyur ro// de song ba las ji tsam na rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo // bram ze des bsam pa ci bdag gi rgyal po la
142a8('dul ba): bstod dam/ 'on te glang po dam pa la snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ glang po che dam 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis bdud rtsir yid du 'ong ba yin la/ rgyal po
142b1('dul ba): la ni khyad par du yin pas/ re shig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod par bya'o snyam nas/ des tshig su bcad de smras pa/ sa srung bu'i lus kyis sha tshug ltar/ mtshan mchog
142b2('dul ba): ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ mdog dang tshad kyis gzugs legs pa// gang tshe dbang po bkra shis rab du bsngags/ de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas// tshig
142b3('dul ba): su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba// mi rnams mig 'phrog dga' ba bskyed pa gang // de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyis// grong la grong mi mchog
142b4('dul ba): ni lnga sbyin no// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyis glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyis bram ze gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ de
142b5('dul ba): na yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas nges 'di grong mchog lnga byin no// da ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas ngas yang
142b6('dul ba): 'dir rang byang chub du lung bstan to// grong khyer chen por gshegs pa nas/ grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// yul
142b7('dul ba): srug nar gshegs pa dang / yul srug na/ bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs dang lang mtsho dang thos par gyur nas/ bdag dang 'dra ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes
142b8('dul ba): sgrogaso// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te chos chad de// bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas
143a1('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul srug nar byon to zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te dge sbyong ko'u ta ma gzugs bzang po mdzes pa lta na sdug
143a2('dul ba): ba zhes bya ba thos kyis/ ci bdag las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam/ 'on te ma yin ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de byung ba dang / ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das skra skyes bu
143a3('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgya bcus mdzes par byas pas 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag
143a4('dul ba): ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyis/
143a5('dul ba): tshad ni lhag par ring ba ni ma yin no snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug gtor blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ma mthong nas/ de phyogs shin du mtho ba zhig la
143a6('dul ba): 'dzegs na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze nyon mongs kyis thong shig/ gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te
143a7('dul ba): ltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i sangs
143a8('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug gtor mi mthong ngo zhes ma thos sam/ 'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na/ khyod kyis khyim na/
143b1('dul ba): me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na/ can dan sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyis/ de yod la gzhol cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las 'khrungs
143b2('dul ba): pa'i sku'i tshad ni de yin no// bram ze dbang pos bsam pa/ de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste/ bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na song ste blta'o// snyam nas/ de rings pa
143b3('dul ba): rings par song nas me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las/ de thams cad de de bzhin du gyur to// de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsam pa/
143b4('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis/ song la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
143b5('dul ba): nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs
143b6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i
143b7('dul ba): dus brtsegs pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden
143b8('dul ba): pa mthong nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags so mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su
144a1('dul ba): mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid mtsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar
144a2('dul ba): mngon par dad lag so// de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar
144a3('dul ba): ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das gnang na/ bdag gis tsan dan sa phyogs gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams
144a4('dul ba): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze gnang gis song la shoms shig/ de nas des phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu rim 'gro chen pos mchod
144a5('dul ba): sdong sgong nas dus mchod chen po bshams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan drag gis kyang / rten dge bar gyur cig ces bya bar rig nas/ rtsa ku sha btags te bram ze
144a6('dul ba): dbang pos mchod sdong gis mchod bshams nas dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grag so// gang gis tshe bcom ldan 'das dang mnyan yod du/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/
144a7('dul ba): mu stegs can rnams ni spa kong / lha dang sti rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni yid rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob du
144a8('dul ba): gnas shing kha cig ni bram ze'i khye'u'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko'us la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bram ze'i grong du gshegs so//
144b1('dul ba): mu stegs can rnams kyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo // zhes zos so// zos nas kyang rings pa rings par bram ze khyim bdag rnams kyis khyim du song ste/ lhags nas smras pa
144b2('dul ba): chos thos par gyur cig/ chos thos par gyur cig de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag de cig kho bo cag gi khyed kyis phun sum tshogs pa mthong gi/ ji srid rgud pa ma
144b3('dul ba): mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rgud pa gang lags shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya
144b4('dul ba): lnga bcu dang / spus gri'i ser ba 'bab zhing 'ong ste/ bu dang bcas pa dum bu med par byed par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gang dag gis tshe kho na ma zhugs
144b5('dul ba): shing grogs bgyi ba la thugs pa de kho na'i tshe bzhad na bzang po ma lags te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te/
144b6('dul ba): gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsad na ni 'khod par bya'o// bzhugs shing bsad par bgyi'o// zhes de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs khu tshur bcangs/ go bgos
144b7('dul ba): te byung ba dang / lam gyi dbus na shAkya rgang po zhig 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang du 'dod// de rnams kyis smras pa/ dgra bsad pa'i phyir ro// khyed cag
144b8('dul ba): gis dgra su yin/ dge sbyong go'u ta me'o// shes ldan dag gal te/ bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na/ byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ shes ldan dag slar log shig
145a1('dul ba): de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig/
145a2('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ des ri brag tu zhugs nas mi btang ba dang / ri brag kun tshig bas/ ca co'i ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas spangs te smras pa/ shes ldan bdag
145a3('dul ba): cag dang dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni thag ring po kho na yin gyis/ ri brag 'dir ni phung po chen po gzhan 'di 'byung ste ris me bsregs kyis me bsad kyis slar ldog go/ zhes de rnams
145a4('dul ba): kyis bsad par brtsams pa dang / bsad par ma nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag ci byed bcom ldan 'das ri brag
145a5('dul ba): rnams zhugs kyi tshig na/ dgum par rngo ma thog lags so// ngas gsad dam bcom ldan 'das dgum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs phyang ma thag kho nar yang sad
145a6('dul ba): rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyis mthu dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to// de rnams mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gis slad du
145a7('dul ba): gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas
145a8('dul ba): de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la
145b1('dul ba): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong rnams the/
145b2('dul ba): chom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bas/
145b3('dul ba): te/ ri brag pa sregs la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de ltar 'ga' zhig tu ma zad de// ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags
145b4('dul ba): pas bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te/ ri brags bsregs pa de legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brag zhig na spre'u
145b5('dul ba): lnga brgya'i tshogs gnas pa/ lo tog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud bzan to// ri brags gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/
145b6('dul ba): ldan dag spre'u rnams kyi lo tog la gnod pa byed na de la ji ltar bsgrubs par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ spre'u rnams bsad mod/ de rnams ji ltar bsad par bya/ ri brags
145b7('dul ba): nye 'khor shing thams cad de shing tin du ka cig pu zhig bzhag la nye 'khor rnams tsher mas bskor ba de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dang /
145b8('dul ba): der de rnams kyis ri brags kyi nye 'khor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/ shing tin du ka cig pu bzhag la nye 'khor rnams tsher ma'i ra bas bskor te/ bsrung mi pa'i mi bzhag nas/ bgo/
146a1('dul ba): ba khyed kyis gang gi che spre'u rnams tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron cig/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na shin du ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te srin/
146a2('dul ba): pa dang / spre'u rnams kyis sde dpon la smras pa/ sde dpon shing tin du ka smin cing mchis kyis gsol du gshegs so// de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang / shing tin du ka de la 'dzeg
146a3('dul ba): te shing ting du ka bza' bar brtsam so// de nas srung ma'i mis/ ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/ shes ldan dag shing tin du ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas/ za bar byed
146a4('dul ba): kyis khyed kyis bya ba 'am/ byed pa gang yin pa de gyis shig/ de nas ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lag na mda' gzhu dang / dgra sta thogs/ khu tshur bcangs de/ rings
146a5('dul ba): par song nas shing tin du ka bcad par brtsams pa dang / de nas spre'u rnams bred de 'tshong rgal zhing / shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do// sde dpon ni sems las chung ngus za bar
146a6('dul ba): byed pa dang / spre'u rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sde dpon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams nga ba thob cing mchis te/ phan tshun du rgyu lags na khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral
146a7('dul ba): chung ngus bzhugs/ de nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la// bya ba min pa de dang 'dra// shing ni 'gro ni mang yod pas// sems las skyugs te bza' bar
146a8('dul ba): gyis nya de nas sde dpon gyis dbang phyug ri brag de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyo/
146b1('dul ba): der 'ongs pa dang / de sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud de smras pa/ da ltar ri brag na gnas
146b2('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du 'ongs nas ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis phyi rol gnod pa ma byas cing ji ltar kho bos khyod kyis
146b3('dul ba): grol lo zhes des dkrol ba dang / de nas ri brag der mi btang ste/ ri brag kun tshig nas ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa/ shes
146b4('dul ba): ldan dag bdag dang spre'u rnams thag ring po kho na yin gyis/ bung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste/ ri brags de bsregs kyis me bsad kyi slar ldog go zhes de rnams me bsad pa'i
146b5('dul ba): phyir rgyag pa dung spre'u rnams kyang shing tin du ka las babs nas bros so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ spre'u khrug gu gang yin pa de ni/ shAkya rgad po 'di nyid yin te/ de na
146b6('dul ba): yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brags bsregs la/ da ltar yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag sregs so// nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas/ nag po'i grong khyer du
146b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// ro hi ta ka byin nas ro hi ta ka na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe gnod sbyin grang
146b8('dul ba): stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun sar song ba dang sa 'as/ gnod sbyin glang tshon stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das skyes par byon nas/ ro hi to ka na
147a1('dul ba): bdag gis gnas kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
147a2('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan
147a3('dul ba): pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab du dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsungs ngo zhes bya ba'i
147a4('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
147a5('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das do nod bdag gis gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin
